name: WorksheetProtectionOptions
description: Represents the options in sheet protection.

properties.name: allowFormatCells
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing formatting cells.

properties.name: allowFormatColumns
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing formatting columns.

properties.name: allowFormatRows
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing formatting rows.

properties.name: allowInsertColumns
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing inserting columns.

properties.name: allowInsertRows
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing inserting rows.

properties.name: allowInsertHyperlinks
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing inserting hyperlinks.

properties.name: allowDeleteColumns
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing deleting columns.

properties.name: allowDeleteRows
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing deleting rows.

properties.name: allowSort
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing using sort feature.

properties.name: allowAutoFilter
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing using auto filter feature.

properties.name: allowPivotTables
properties.description: Represents the worksheet protection option of allowing using PivotTable feature.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
